resources.string: The Search by Name Page allows you to enter the name of the drink you are looking for or scroll to browse all drinks.

The Results Page shows the drinks you will like the most to the drinks that you will like the least from top to bottom that fit your search constraints. If you have rated the drink, your rating shows in red stars and if you have not yet rated the drink, then our predicted rating for you shows in yellow stars. Click on a drink to view its info page.

The Drink Info page contains the given drink\'s ingredients list, description, flavor profile, and your current rating for the drink. By clicking the stars you can change your rating at any time. If you would like to save this drink, add it to your favorites list by clicking the \'Add to Favorites\' under the picture.

Search By Ingredients allows you to get drink recommendations by selecting the ingredients that you would like your drink results to contain. Check the box next to the ingredient to add it to your search. You can type ingredients into the search box above and it will filter to the ingredients that start with the letters you have entered. You may check any boxes, and delete your text to view all ingredients again. Your boxes will stay checked. Click the \'Search\' button to complete your search.
Advanced Search is a combination of Search By Ingredient, Search By Flavor, Search By Category, and Search By Name.
Search By Category allows you to search for drink recommendations based on category such as \'Martinis\' or \'Shooters\' or \'Seasonal\'. Click a category icon to get started.
Search by flavor allows you to get drink recommendations based on your flavor preferences. Slide the each seeek bar to change the flavor intensity from 0 (least intense) to 5 (most intense).

Your Favorite Drinks page is where you can view, edit, and remove drinks that you have previously saved in your favorites list. You may click on any drink and you will be taken to its drink info page where you can rerate the drink at any time. Press \'Edit\' to edit and remove drinks from your list at any time.

Try Something New is the quickest way to get drink recommendations tailored to your preferences. We evaluate your current rated drinks and recommend you drinks based on what you like and what you don\'t like.
Press an icon to select the category of cocktail you want. Press and hold an icon to see information about that category.

Search by Ingredients allows you to get drink recommendations by selecting the ingredients you would like in your drink. \n Check each box of the ingredients you would like. To find ingredients, you can enter the ingredient name into the search box and it will filter to the ingredients that your text starts with. To revert back to browsing all ingredients, delete the text in the search box. Your checked ingredients will stay selected. Once you have selected all the ingredients you would like, press "Search"

Welcome to OneDrinkAway, the ultimate cocktail recommendation application!

Browse all Drinks
		•Browse all of our drink recipes in alphabetical order, as well as enter a specific drink name.

Search By Category
		•Look for drinks by category, such as shooters, seasonal cocktails, and jello-shots.

Search By Ingredients
		•Look for drinks by entering various ingredients.

Search by Flavors
		•Looks for drinks by entering various flavor intensities

Favorite Drinks List
		•Keeps track of all of your favorite drinks. You can favorite a drink when on that drink's info page

Advanced Search
		•A combination of Search By Category, Ingredients, and Flavors that's designed for more specific searches

Try Something New
		•Suggests a drink for the user at the touch of a button!
On the Rocks category help displays here
Coming Soon to an App Near You!
